title: It is up to PPP to decide about joining Federal Cabinet: Gilani
content:
KARACHI, Jun 03 (APP): Senate Chairman Syed Yousuf Raza Gilani on Monday said that it was up to the Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP) to decide about joining the Federal Cabinet.
The party already had constitutional posts in the federation and provinces, he said while responding to media persons’ queries after performing the groundbreaking of residential towers in Askari 2.
The Senate chairman said that the PPP was known for taking mature decisions. It was the PPP which had restored the 1973 Constitution, besides abolishing the 58-2B clause, he added.
Replying to a question, he said that the future of political parties was linked to the people’s liking and disliking.
To another question, he said that all the institutions should work within their constitutional limits
As regards the construction of towers in different cities, he said it would create jobs for the people.
